descriptionHtml:
[center][b][font=Arial][size=6]Treva [color=#f9cb9c]Two-[/color][color=#8D2525]Face[/color]
[/size][/font][/b][size=4]Race: Breton[/size]

[size=2]There are two files. "Treva - Normal Lips" has a regular mouth with no changes, while "Treva - Alternate Lips" has lips that are frowning on the left side and smirking on the right side. This gives her an extra two-facey look. 

Please note that her scar will not show up upon loading the preset, you will have to add it yourself. The scar used in most of the screenshots is from Diverse Scars, although I added a screenshot of what she looks like with scars used from both Diverse Scars and XCE Scarface (no longer on Nexus). Proper list of mods used below.[/size]



[size=5]Installation:[/size]

[size=2]Put the .jslot file in your skyrim/data/skse/plugins/chargen/presets folder. 
Start the game, open up RaceMenu, and load the preset! Make sure you choose Breton as the race or it will not look as intended.[/size]



[size=5]Mods needed to get the same look: 
[/size][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]
RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35327/?]SG Female Eyebrows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50032/?]KJ Tattoos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13076/?]Cute Eyes[/url] (or any retexture of vanilla eyes)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79735/?]Salt and Wind for KS Hairdos[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34539/?]Battle Hardened Warpaints[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49050/?]Diverse Scars[/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP Body[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57083/?]HN66s Hands[/url]
[/size] 
[size=2]The burn scar from XCE Scarface by Xenius looks great with Treva and gives her a more grotesque look, but of course is not required. The mod is no longer on Nexus.[/size]


[size=5]Extra Credits:
[/size]
[size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/75861/?]Book of UUNP Bodyslide[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909/?]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41482/?]Rudy ENB
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71063/?]Facelight Plus[/url]
Halo's Poser
Thanks to snelss0 for his [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82060/?]Celena Preset[/url] that I used as a base![/size][/center]
[size=1][center][/center][/size]
author: Desquin
